item.title: The GWAS Catalog Team
item.description:
I have been lately trying to write an R package to access the GWAS Catalog REST API. Many questions have arisen but the GWAS Catalog team has been there to help me out. To make sure I start associating the name of the persons I have been interacting with with a face, I made this postcard (I hope I got the names right):

(image blatantly copied from Ten years of the GWAS Catalog â€“ Past, present and future)
